page.title: 08INTERVIEW - BROWN FARM
page.content: Tourism The area contains one or two farms that offer bed and breakfast for about Â£10 a night. The area tends to be used as a base for tourists particularly those from the northern and industrial centres because of the proximity of Dartmoor and Exmoor National Parks. The nearest hotel is in Wiveliscombe. The sort of tourist using the area tends to go out during the day and return to the farm for the evening, not going out again until the following day. (For further details see page 18)
